resources.string: "There is no permission to determine the location of device. The work of the program will be continued without determine of the device location."
"Determine the location of the device isn't granted."
"Open Permissions and grant the determine the location of the device"
"The location permission is needed to show the location of user on map"
"No location detected. Make sure location is enabled on the device. The work of the program will continue without displaying the user\'s coordinates."
